pullrequest.title: Issue_45: Service requests without input parameter

content.raw: You've done a nice work writing tests in `Node_TEST` that cover the new functionality when all nodes are within the same process. Could you also write new tests in `test/integration/` to cover the case where the nodes are running in different processes?
content.html: You've done a nice work writing tests in Node_TEST that cover the new functionality when all nodes are within the same process. Could you also write new tests in test/integration/ to cover the case where the nodes are running in different processes?
